_sassy.p_sassy.MessageService.msg

MessageService.msg(name: str, extra: Optional[str] = None) → _sassy.d_sassy.Message

Read a message.

Parameters

  • name (str) – The message name.

  • extra (Optional[str]) – Extra information.

Returns (Message):

A Message DTO.
